languages.text:
The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}.
The next time the Soldier uses {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}.
languages.original_text: Солдат немедленно тратит все свои {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает бонус +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности укрытия{/g}. При следующем использовании Стрельбы на бегу солдат вернет обратно все потраченные ОД и ОП и получит +1 ОД дополнительно. Также для всех способностей солдата, кроме Стрельбы на бегу, завершится период восстановления.

traits.locale_text: The Marksman immediately spends all their AP and MP and gains a +30% bonus to cover efficiency. The next time the Marksman uses Shot on the Run, they gain all the spent action points and movement points back plus 1 additional AP and reset the cooldown of all of the Marksman's abilities except for Shot on the Run.

The Marksman immediately spends all their AP and MP and gains a +30% bonus to cover efficiency. The next time the Marksman uses Run and Gun, they gain back all spent action points and movement points plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Marksman's abilities except for Run and Gun.

The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}. The next time the Soldier uses Run and Gun, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for Run and Gun.

The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}. The next time the Soldier uses Run and Gun, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for Run and Gun.

languages.text:
Солдат немедленно тратит все свои {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает бонус +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности укрытия{/g}.
При следующем использовании {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбы на бегу{/g} солдат вернет обратно все потраченные ОД и ОП и получит +1 ОД дополнительно. Также для всех способностей солдата, кроме {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбы на бегу{/g}, завершится период восстановления.

The next time the Soldier uses {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Солдат немедленно тратит все свои {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает бонус +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности укрытия{/g}.
При следующем использовании {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбы на бегу{/g} солдат вернет обратно все потраченные ОД и ОП и получит +1 ОД дополнительно. Также для всех способностей солдата, кроме {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Стрельбы на бегу{/g}, завершится период восстановления.

Стрелок немедленно тратит все свои ОД и ОП и получает +30% к эффективности укрытия. При следующем использовании Стрельбы на бегу стрелок вернет обратно все потраченные ОД и ОП и получит +1 ОД дополнительно. Также для всех способностей стрелка, кроме Стрельбы на бегу, завершится период восстановления.

languages.text:
士兵立刻消耗所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，并获得+30%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}加值。
当士兵再次使用{g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}奔袭射击{/g}时，会获得所有之前消耗的行动点数与移动点数，同时额外获得1点行动点数。此外，除了{g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}奔袭射击{/g}之外，士兵所有其他能力的冷却时间也会重置。
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}.
The next time the Soldier uses {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 神射手立刻消耗所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，并获得+30%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}效果{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。 当神射手再次使用连跑带射时，会获得所有之前消耗的行动点数与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时额外获得1点行动点数。此外，除了连跑带射之外，神射手所有其他能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}也会重置。

士兵立刻消耗所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，并获得+30%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。 当士兵再次使用奔袭射击时，会获得所有之前消耗的行动点数与移动点数，同时额外获得1点行动点数。此外，除了奔袭射击之外，士兵所有其他{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}也会重置。

languages.text: El soldado gasta inmediatamente todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y recibe una bonificación de +30 % a la eficacia de la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}. La próxima vez que el soldado use {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Disparo a la carrera{/g}, recupera todos los PA y PM gastados más 1 PA adicional. También reinicia el tiempo de recuperación de todas las capacidades del soldado excepto Disparo a la carrera.
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}.
The next time the Soldier uses {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El tirador de élite gasta inmediatamente todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y recibe una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +30 % a la eficacia de la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cobertura{/g}. La próxima vez que el tirador de élite use Disparo en movimiento, recupera todos los puntos de acción y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} gastados más 1 PA adicional. También reinicia el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de todas las capacidades del tirador de élite excepto Disparo en movimiento.

languages.text:
Der Soldat verbraucht sofort sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und erhält einen Bonus von +30 % auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g}.
Setzt der Soldat das nächste Mal {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Laufen und ballern{/g} ein, erhält er sämtliche AP und BP sowie 1 zusätzlichen AP. Darüber hinaus wird die Abklingzeit aller anderen Fähigkeiten des Soldaten außer {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Laufen und ballern{/g}zurückgesetzt.
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}.
The next time the Soldier uses {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Scharfschütze verbraucht sofort sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und erlangt einen{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +30 % auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}Deckungseffizienz{/g}. Wenn der Scharfschütze das nächste Mal Laufen und Schießen einsetzt, erhält er sämtliche Aktionspunkte und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} zurück, außerdem noch 1 zusätzlichen AP. Darüber hinaus wird die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} aller anderen Fähigkeiten des Scharfschützen bis auf Laufen und Schießen zurückgesetzt.

languages.text:
Le soldat dépense immédiatement tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, et un bonus de +30 % s'applique à l'efficacité de sa {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g}.
Lors de l'utilisation suivante de {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Tir à la volée{/g} par le soldat, celui-ci récupère tous ses PA et PD ainsi que 1 PA supplémentaire. Le temps de recharge de toutes les autres capacités du soldat est également réinitialisé, sauf pour {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Tir à la volée{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}.
The next time the Soldier uses {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Tireur d'Élite dépense immédiatement tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +30 % s'applique à l'efficacité de sa {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g}. Lors de l'utilisation suivante de Sauve qui Peut ! par le Tireur d'Élite, celui-ci récupère tous ses points d'action et tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} ainsi que 1 PA supplémentaire. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de toutes les autres capacités du Tireur d'Élite est également réinitialisé, sauf pour Sauve qui Peut !.

languages.text: 兵士は即座にすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費し、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}に+30%のボーナスを得る。 次のラン＆ガン使用時、消費したAPとMPがすべて払い戻され、1APが追加される。さらに、ラン＆ガン以外のすべての他の兵士のアビリティのクールダウンをリセットする。
languages.original_text: The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}. The next time the Soldier uses Run and Gun, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for Run and Gun.

traits.locale_text: 兵士は即座にすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費し、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}に+30%のボーナスを得る。 次のラン＆ガン使用時、消費したAPとMPがすべて払い戻され、1APが追加される。さらに、ラン＆ガン以外のすべての他の兵士のアビリティのクールダウンをリセットする。

兵士は即座にすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費し、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}に+30%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。 次のラン・アンド・ガン使用時、消費したAPとMPがすべて払い戻され、1AP追加される。さらに、ラン・アンド・ガン以外の全ての他の兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}をリセットする。

languages.text:
Asker, anında tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'sini harcar ve {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper etkililiği{/g} değerine +%30 bonus kazanır.
Asker bir daha {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Fırla ve Mıhla{/g} kullandığında, harcadığı tüm EP ve HP'yi geri almasının yanı sıra ilave 1 puan EP kazanır. Ayrıca Asker'in {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Fırla ve Mıhla{/g} haricindeki tüm diğer kabiliyetlerinin dolum süresi sıfırlanır.
languages.original_text:
The Soldier immediately spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains a +30% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}.
The next time the Soldier uses {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, they gain back all spent AP and MP plus 1 additional AP. It also resets the cooldown of all other Soldier's abilities except for {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}.
